exceptions.tactic: intros X Q k x H.
pose proof (fmap_reifier_t X Q k H) as Hf.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
Q: nat -> X -> Prop
k: nat
x: X

Goal:
(forall i : nat, i < k -> {x : X | Q i x}) -> {f : nat -> X | forall i : nat, i < k -> Q i (f i)}

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fmap_reifier_t : forall (X : Type) (Q : nat -> X -> Prop) (k : nat), (forall i : nat, i < k -> {x : X | Q i x}) -> {f : forall i : nat, i < k -> X | forall (i : nat) (Hi : i < k), Q i (f i Hi)}
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- nat] ?n : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- nat]
ssrfun.s2valP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?P (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- ?T -> Prop]
ssrfun.s2valP' : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?Q (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- ?T -> Prop]
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- nat]
ssrfun.svalP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x}, ?P (proj1_sig u) where ?T : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- ?T -> Prop]
ssrfun.sig_of_sig2 : forall (I : Type) (P Q : I -> Prop), {x : I | P x & Q x} -> {i : I | P i /\ Q i}
VectorDef.replace_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n where ?A : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- nat]
ssrfun.Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x : ?I & T_ x} where ?I : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- Type] ?i : [X : Type Q : nat -> X -> Prop k : nat x : X |- ?I]
lt_wf_double_rec : forall P : nat -> nat -> Set, (forall n m : nat, (forall p q : nat, p < n -> P p q) -> (forall p : nat, p < m -> P n p) -> P n m) -> forall n m : nat, P n m
lt_wf_rect : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Type), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
lt_wf_rect1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Type), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
lt_wf_rec : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Set), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
lt_wf_rec1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Set), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
Nat.lt_ind : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : nat, A (S n) -> (forall m : nat, n < m -> A m -> A (S m)) -> forall m : nat, n < m -> A m
ssrfun.s2val = fun (T : Type) (P Q : T -> Prop) '(exist2 _ _ x _ _) => x : forall (T : Type) (P Q : T -> Prop), {x : T | P x & Q x} -> T Arguments ssrfun.s2val {T}%type_scope {P Q}%function_scope
ssrbool.all_sig_cond : forall (I T : Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : I -> T -> Prop), T -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T | P x y}) -> {f : I -> T | forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
ssrbool.all_sig_cond_dep : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : forall x : I, T x -> Prop), (forall x : I, T x) -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T x | P x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x | forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.right_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n
ssrfun.all_sig : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (P : forall x : I, T x -> Prop), (forall x : I, {y : T x | P x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x | forall x : I, P x (f x)}
well_founded_lt_compat : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> f x < f y) -> well_founded R
ssrbool.all_tag_cond_dep : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (U : forall x : I, T x -> Type), (forall x : I, T x) -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T x & U x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x & forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> U x (f x)}
induction_ltof1 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (P : A -> Type), (forall x : A, (forall y : A, ltof A f y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
induction_ltof2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (P : A -> Type), (forall x : A, (forall y : A, ltof A f y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
ssrfun.all_tag : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (U : forall x : I, T x -> Type), (forall x : I, {y : T x & U x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x & forall x : I, U x (f x)}
EqdepFacts.eq_sig_fst : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x1 x2 : X) (H1 : P x1) (H2 : P x2), exist P x1 H1 = exist P x2 H2 -> x1 = x2
ssrfun.tag_of_sig : forall (I : Type) (P : I -> Prop), {x : I | P x} -> {x : I & P x}
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Nat.lt_1_l : forall n m : nat, 0 < n -> n < m -> 1 < m
Nat.lt_1_l' : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m < p -> 1 < p
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Wf_Z.Z_of_nat_complete_inf : forall x : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 x -> {n : nat | x = BinInt.Z.of_nat n}
Nat.log2_same : forall a b : nat, 0 < a -> 0 < b -> Nat.log2 a = Nat.log2 b -> a < 2 * b
Nat.log2_up_same : forall a b : nat, 0 < a -> 0 < b -> Nat.log2_up a = Nat.log2_up b -> a < 2 * b
Nat.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
Nat.le_lt_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p
Inductive proof : Set := Hyp : forall e : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 e -> Ztac.proof | Add : Ztac.proof -> Ztac.proof -> Ztac.proof | Mul : Ztac.proof -> Ztac.proof -> Ztac.proof | Cst : BinNums.Z -> Ztac.proof Arguments Ztac.Hyp {e}%Z_scope Arguments Ztac.Cst _%Z_scope
Nat.mod_bound_pos : forall x y : nat, 0 <= x -> 0 < y -> 0 <= x mod y < y

```  
intros X Q k x H.
pose proof (fmap_reifier_t X Q k H) as Hf.
exists (fun i Hi => proj1_sig (Hf i Hi)).
intros i Hi.
exact (proj2_sig (Hf i Hi)).

original: intros X Q k x H. pose proof (fmap_reifier_t X Q k H) as Hf. exists (fun i Hi => proj1_sig (Hf i Hi)). intros i Hi. apply (proj2_sig (Hf i Hi)).
